channel.title: Master Your Mountains
channel.description: Podcasts designed to give you motivation, inspiration and encouragement to climb the mountains in your life. To overcome and get to the top of common obstacles most of us face on a daily basis.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Motivational podcasts to get you to the top and help you master the mountains in your life.
channel.itunes:author: Amanda Taylor
channel.itunes:summary: Podcasts designed to give you motivation, inspiration and encouragement to climb the mountains in your life. To overcome and get to the top of common obstacles most of us face on a daily basis.

item.title: Think Like A Fan - MYM - Episode 4
item.description: In this episode, Amanda discusses how becoming your own biggest fan and incorporating the actions of sports fanatics and applying them to yourself can make a big change in your life. Feel free to e-mail comments and questions to 'masteryourmountains@gmail.com' Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Amanda Taylor
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, Amanda discusses how becoming your own biggest fan and incorporating the actions of sports fanatics and applying them to yourself can make a big change in your life. Feel free to e-mail comments and questions to 'masteryourmountains@gmail.com' Thanks for listening!

item.title: Time Management - MYM Episode 3
item.description: The third episode of Master Your Mountains, where Amanda discusses time management strategy, and ways to 'find' more time. Be sure to visit the MYM blog at http://www.MasterYourMountains.tumblr.com for more quality content. Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Amanda Taylor
item.itunes:summary: The third episode of Master Your Mountains, where Amanda discusses time management strategy, and ways to 'find' more time. Be sure to visit the MYM blog at http://www.MasterYourMountains.tumblr.com for more quality content. Thanks for listening!

item.title: Embarrassment - MYM Episode 2
item.description: Don't let embarrassment stop you from living your life to the fullest.
item.dc:creator: Amanda Taylor
item.itunes:summary: Don't let embarrassment stop you from living your life to the fullest.

item.title: Living Fully - MYM Episode 1
item.description: Premier Master Your Mountains podcast, where I talk about the importance of living fully.
item.dc:creator: Amanda Taylor
item.itunes:summary: Premier Master Your Mountains podcast, where I talk about the importance of living fully.
